attributes.title: Weighting History
attributes.introduction: Below you can observe a record of historical weightings.
attributes.historyContent:
### PLUTO v2 (16/10/2023)

| Question | Answer | Weight |
|-----------------------|--------|-------|
| 1 Which of the answers below best describe the data user? | | |
| 1a | Individual citizen/researcher | 1y |
| 1b | Public organisation | 1y |
| 1c | Private company | -1y |
| 1d | Charity | 1y |
| 1e | Other | 0 |
| 2 Which of the answers below best describe the primary activity of the data user? | | |
| 2a | Sell a product/service | -1y |
| 2b | Fulfil a government task | 0 |
| 2c | Conduct applied research | 0 |
| 2d | Conduct basic research | 1y |
| 2e | None of the above | 0 |
| 2f | I don’t know | 0 |
| 3 Which of the answers below best describe the financial structure of the data user? | | |
| 3a | Predominantly financed through income from own activities or parent/partner company | -1y |
| 3b | Predominantly financed by governmental organisations (national or international) | 0 |
| 3c | Predominantly financed by philanthropic foundations | 1y |
| 3d | Predominantly financed by way of large donations (above 5000€ or equivalent per donation) | -1y |
| 3e | Predominantly financed by way of small donations (up to 5000€ or equivalent per donation) | 1y |
| 3f | None of the above | 0 |
| 3g | I don’t know | 0 |
